sqls.sql: select d.parent_key, t.storage_unit_key, t.storage_unit_name, t.description, t.max_storage_duration, u.current_storage_i, u.storage_zone_barcode_s, u.machinecode_s, u.erpcode_s, u.inventory_materialcode_s, u.lastintime_t, u.lockflag_s, u.lockinflag_s, u.lockoutflag_s, u.canuse_s, u.operater_s, u.operatetime_t from storage_unit t, uda_storageunit u, storagezone_storageunit d where t.storage_unit_key = u.object_key(+) and t.storage_unit_key = d.child_key(+) and d.parent_key = :parent_key order by t.storage_unit_name

select t.storage_unit_name from storage_unit t, uda_storageunit u, storagezone_storageunit d where t.storage_unit_key = u.object_key(+) and t.storage_unit_key = d.child_key(+) and d.parent_key = :parent_key order by t.storage_unit_name
select t.category from Storage_Zone t where t.storage_zone_key=:zoneKey

sql.comment: 校验库位编码是否存在

sqls.sql: select t.storage_unit_name from storage_unit t, uda_storageunit u, storagezone_storageunit d where t.storage_unit_key = u.object_key(+) and t.storage_unit_key = d.child_key(+) and d.parent_key = :parent_key and t.storage_unit_name=:unitName
